uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.generator.service
Class AnalyticsGeneratorService<T>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.generator.service.AnalyticsGeneratorService<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExperimentAnalyticsGeneratorService
public abstract class AnalyticsGeneratorService<T>
extends Object

An abstract AnalyticsGeneratorService, that provides convenience methods for getting and setting parameters required across all AnalyticsGenerator implementations. This class is typed by the type of the repository backing this AnalyticsGeneratorService - this may be a file, a datasource, an FTP directory, or something else. Implementing classes have access to this repository and an AtlasDAO that provides interaction with the Atlas database (following an Atlas 2 schema).

All implementing classes should provide the method createAnalytics() which contains the logic for constructing the relevant parts of the index for each implementation. Clients should call generateAnalytics() to trigger Analytics construction. At the moment, this method simply delegates to the abstract form, but extra initialisation may go in this method.

Author:
Tony Burdett
